The configuration of properties here typically ranges from compact builder floors ideal for nuclear families to sprawling independent villas suitable for large joint families.

faqSection.title: Key Questions Answered When You Look to Buy House in Sector 63 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get all your queries addressed regarding property types investment returns and residential amenities available in Sector 63 Gurugram before making your purchase decision.

faqs.question: What types of properties are available if I want to buy house in Sector 63 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Sector 63 primarily offers independent builder floors and custom-built houses or villas. The builder floors are highly popular offering sizes typically ranging from 2 BHK to spacious 4 BHK units with independent entrances and dedicated parking. Independent houses are available on larger plots such as 8 Marla to 14 Marla catering to the ultra-luxury segment. These houses often feature high-end specifications private lifts and extensive landscaping providing an exclusive residential experience highly sought after in Gurugram. We maintain an exclusive inventory of verified properties across all these configurations.

faqs.question: Is Sector 63 a good location for investment appreciation right now
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 63 is considered one of the prime investment locations along the Golf Course Extension Road corridor. Its growth is driven by excellent infrastructure superior connectivity and proximity to major commercial hubs like AIPL and Worldmark. Property experts predict stable and robust capital appreciation in this sector over the next five to seven years thanks to continued demand from working professionals and HNIs looking for premium independent housing options. Investing in a house here is highly recommended for securing future wealth.

faqs.question: What are the average price ranges for houses in Sector 63 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The price range for houses in Sector 63 varies significantly based on the type of property size and specific amenities offered. Builder floors typically start from approximately 175 Cr for a standard 3 BHK unit and can go upwards of 350 Cr depending on floor level and construction quality. Larger independent houses or villas on 10 Marla plots or more often fall in the range of 10 Cr to 25 Cr or higher. We provide detailed pricing analysis based on current market trends and specific property features to ensure informed decision making.

faqs.question: How is the connectivity and transport infrastructure in Sector 63
faqs.answer: Connectivity is a major highlight of Sector 63. It is strategically positioned near the intersection of the Golf Course Extension Road and the Southern Peripheral Road SPR ensuring fast access to Delhi and Manesar. While the sector does not have its own metro station the Rapid Metro network station at Sector 55-56 is just a short drive away significantly improving public transit options. Furthermore wide well-maintained roads and seamless integration with major expressways ensure minimal traffic congestion for residents.

faqs.question: Are there good schools and hospitals near houses in Sector 63
faqs.answer: The social infrastructure supporting Sector 63 is exceptional. For education world-renowned schools like Heritage Xperiential Learning School DPS International and Scottish High International School are within a 10 to 15-minute drive. For healthcare residents have access to top multi-specialty hospitals including Artemis Hospital Medanta The Medicity and Paras Hospitals ensuring high-quality medical services are readily available making it an ideal place for families.

faqs.question: What are the typical amenities provided in houses in Sector 63
faqs.answer: Modern houses and builder floors in Sector 63 are equipped with premium amenities focused on luxury and convenience. Standard features include modular kitchens imported fittings high-speed internet provisions power backup facilities and dedicated car parking. Many high-end properties also include facilities like private elevators servant quarters and smart home automation systems enhancing the overall residential experience and safety.

faqs.question: What documents should I verify before I buy house in Sector 63 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Before finalizing a purchase you must verify several key documents including the original title deed chain of previous owners the property’s completion certificate occupation certificate and all relevant municipal approvals. If purchasing a builder floor ensure the underlying land title is clear and that the floor is legally registered. Our legal team provides full due diligence support verifying all documentation to ensure a smooth and risk-free transaction for you.

faqs.question: Is the water and electricity supply reliable in this sector
faqs.answer: Sector 63 benefits from being a relatively new and well-planned sector under GMDA development. Generally the water and electricity supply is robust and reliable compared to older parts of the city. Most residential complexes and independent houses have mandatory provision for 100% power backup via generators to handle any unforeseen outages ensuring continuous power supply for essential services providing great peace of mind.

faqs.question: Are there many green spaces or parks available for residents
faqs.answer: Yes despite its urban location Sector 63 planning includes designated areas for green parks and open recreational spaces. Many premium housing societies and individual houses are built around landscaped greens providing residents with opportunities for outdoor activities and morning walks. The low-density nature of this sector also contributes to a higher ratio of open space per resident.

faqs.question: Can foreigners or NRIs easily buy house in Sector 63 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Yes NRIs and Persons of Indian Origin PIO can legally buy residential property in India including houses in Sector 63 Gurugram subject to compliance with FEMA regulations. We offer specialized services for NRIs including remote viewings legal representation and assistance with necessary repatriation documentation ensuring the entire buying process is seamless and fully compliant with Indian laws.
